forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 65F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 51F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.
